subject: Attention:Michael
body:
Attention:Michael 

Your email has been received regarding your ATM VISA CARD of $3.7 we need from you so that you pay attention and  Follow the instructions to enable us. process and Dispatch it to your address immediately.In addition, it will renew your payment file that will support these transactions, to avoid any interruption with the Federal Bureau of Investigation to interrogate your fund there,in your country, daily and for you. The cost to Irrevocable LEGAL STAY OF PROCEEDINGS of your payment file of US$96 and once this is done we will immediately Dispatch your ATM VISA CARD package will be sent to you within 72hours.and give you the tracking number to monitor the delivery as well.and when arrive to your house
It is urgent that you send us the US$96.00 so that we can proceed with your payment file Irrevocable LEGAL STAY OF PROCEEDINGS which will support your payment file of this office to avoid interruption with your government there 
You will need to make the payment of US$96.00 available to this office using MoneyGram , Ria money transfer or Bitcoin 

I will be waiting to hear from you once I receive this email 
Thanks for your understanding
Regards,
Customer-care
Mr.Frank Kelly,
UBA Bank Group Plc (BR)

subject: Re: Attention:Michael
body:
Hello Kelly,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my ATM VISA CARD. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. I understand that there are some steps I need to follow in order to receive my card.

Could you please provide me with more details about the process and what exactly needs to be done? I want to make sure I understand everything correctly before proceeding. Additionally, could you clarify why there is a need for a payment file renewal and how it relates to the Federal Bureau of Investigation?

Regarding the payment of US, can you explain why it needs to be made through Ria money transfer or Bitcoin specifically? Are there any other payment options available?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Attention:Michael
body:
Attention:MichaelGood Day the $96 is for dispatch your ATM VISA to   your address  through  DHL OR  FEDEX   which you will  send the information to us  such as

subject: Re: Attention:Michael
body:
Hello Kelly,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. However, I must prioritize my personal security and privacy, so I won't be able to provide you with my full name, phone number, address, or any personal details.

If there's any other topic or information you'd like to discuss, please let me know and I'll be happy to engage in conversation.

Best wishes,
Michael

subject: Re: Attention:Michael
body:
Dear MichaelThanks for your email which i revived  now for you to give me  your personal  information which you said that you will not provide good  please tell us the best way you want to revived your fund of $3.7  we are here to save you better 
ThanksFrank Kelly

subject: Re: Attention:Michael
body:

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about how you can help me with my funds. Can you please provide me with some more details about the process and what I need to do?

Looking forward to hearing from you.
